question: Where was the event held to commemorate the 76<sup>th</sup> Anniversary of the First Flag Hoisting by Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose?
explanation: A function was held to commemorate the 76<sup>th</sup> Anniversary of the First Flag Hoisting of Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose at Port Blair. Subhash Mela Committee Swarajdweep has organised bike rally. The cultural programmes were also conducted.
